About us

Some of our thoughts on life, work & development

This is a place where we declare our love for brigadeiros, like a blog but with short-form, mixed-media posts with stuff we like.

Working Sao Paulo

Because of the draught, the water reserves of this city that uses 16.000.000 liters of water per hour, have gotten so low as to make water racioning very likely.
